alert.message: The maximum number of series supported by this instance of InfluxDb has been reached. Information about this issue is found at https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v1.2/concepts/schema_and_data_layout/#don-t-have-too-many-series
alert.name: InfluxDb -  increase in Series and Measurements count

targets.query: SELECT LAST("numSeries") as "numSeries" FROM "database" WHERE "database" = 'graphite' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT LAST("numMeasurements") as "numMeasurements" FROM "database" WHERE "database" = 'graphite' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: graphite DB - Series and Measurements count
